duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop workplace wellbeing strategies aligned with organizational objectives and measure employee wellbeing.
Evaluate workplace wellbeing programs and stay up to date on external campaigns.
Develop employee experience and crisis management procedures in partnership with internal teams.
Monitors crisis alert system and pro-actively address safety events.
Develop and maintain Employee Value Proposition and employee recognition programs.
Conduct employee training related to health, safety, and security.
Prepare quarterly reporting and compliance documents for corporate employee health and safety.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in HR, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
